metadata.title: Foundation Makeup Face Professional Artist Cover Spot Scar Beige Pink Orche New (Beige)

categorization.explanation: The product is a type of foundation makeup, which is typically used on the face. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category, specifically under the 'Makeup' subcategory. However, there is no specific subcategory for face makeup, so a new subcategory 'Face Makeup' is proposed under 'Makeup'.
